title: Did U.S. Rep. Elijah Cummings Dine Lavishly in Italy With House Democrats?
subtitle: Several African American legislators from the U.S. were part of a Congressional delegation that traveled to Italy and Ghana.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: In July 2019, U.S. Rep. Elijah Cummings was in Venice, Italy, with other Democratic lawmakers.
